label: 使部
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Also Tsukaibe; minor Daijōkan functionaries.  The Yōrō Code provided for 160 such positions, to be filled by the sons of men of Sixth, Seventh, or Eighth Rank (p. 358). [太政官、養老令]
